## Summary
A clear and concise description of the problem and the proposed solution.

## Use case / value
- Who benefits (persona/team)?
- What workflow does this improve?
- What’s the measurable impact (time saved, errors reduced, adoption, etc.)?

## Proposed solution
- High-level behavior
- UI/UX (if applicable)
- API/permissions needed (if applicable)

## Alternatives considered
Describe other solutions or workarounds you’ve tried.

## Scope (MVP vs. follow-ups)
- MVP:
  - [ ] Task 1
  - [ ] Task 2
- Nice-to-haves / future:
  - [ ] Item A
  - [ ] Item B

## Acceptance criteria
- [ ] Clear, verifiable conditions for success (e.g., “When a PR is merged, the linked item moves to Done and a comment is posted with the PR link.”)

## Risks & dependencies
- External services, rate limits, permissions, data handling, performance, etc.

## Additional context
Links, screenshots, diagrams, or references.
